org.apache.polygene.api.association

Interface NamedAssociation<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Parameterized associatee type
    All Superinterfaces:
    AbstractAssociation, Iterable<String>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NamedAssociationWrapper

    public interface NamedAssociation<T>
extends Iterable<String>, AbstractAssociation
    Named Association to Entities.

    This works similar to a Map with a String key.

    The Iterable<String> returns the names in the association set. The order during iteration is random by definition, even if other behaviors can possibly be observed. The depends on the underlying entity store implementation.

        Returns:

      • nameOf

        String nameOf(T entity)
        Checks if the entity is present. Note that this is potentially a very slow operation, depending on the size of the NamedAssociation.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to look for.
        Returns:
        The name of the entity if found, otherwise null.

      • toMap
